Alison:

Jack:

Jack:
  Hey, you know what?

You
  need to loosen up.

  I --

Ian:
  Quite a show back there, Ramsey.

Chris:
  Just call it the way I see it.

Ian:
  And what makes you an expert in the shadow department?

Chris:

Ian:
  We need to know what its motives are, so maybe it's enough of the hero

Chris:
  Whoa. Whoa, whoa.

Its
  motives? You think this an it? Ian, this is a courageous man who takes

Ian:
  We don't know that.

  Of course we do. Look at everything he's done.

Chris:

Chris:

Livvie:

Dr.

[Door

Dr.

Dr.

[Captioning

Ian:

Rafe:

Rafe:
  And you'd never know who it is just by looking at it, but gradually, its human

Ian's
  voice: Its need for power overwhelms its need to do justice.

Colleen:

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:
  Ahem.

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:
  Aha! Bingo! Ha-ha!

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:

[Carnival

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:
  Jack --

Jack:
  Guaranteed to blow out every aggression, transgression, obsession, and

Jack:
  I worked a few odd jobs in my day. Now, little lady, you ready?

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:
  I can do that.

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:

Jack:

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:

[Alison

Jack:

Jack:

Alison:

[Bell

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:

Rafe:
  I don't really understand. What are you saying? Is the baby's heart too

dr.

Dr.
  Neumann: Except get yourself better. Focus on that.

Rafe:

Dr.

Livvie:

Dr.
  Neumann: In the meantime, count your blessings.

Livvie:
  Hmm. somebody must be.

Rafe:
  Yeah. You know, I know I didn't exactly shout my joy from the rooftops when I

Livvie:

Rafe:

Rafe:

Rafe:

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:

Alison:

Jack:

Alison:

Jack:

Jack:

Frank:

  And I mentioned that I thought it was cool what he'd done to those hoods --

Ian:

Frank:
  Well, he said it wasn't something I should be laughing about, that this guy

Ian:

Frank:

Ian:

Frank:
  Yeah. I think you're right. Later.

Livvie:
  Disappointed?

Rafe:
  Easy.

Rafe:

Rafe:

Livvie:

Livvie:

Livvie:

Chris:
  Yeah. No, I've seen the property. It's perfect. Yeah. No, no one is to know

Ian:

Ian:

Ian:

Ian:

Colleen:

Ian:
  That's becoming a bad habit, Ramsey. What are you up to?

Livvie:
  I know you're here, and I know you can hear me. Look, answer me, damn it! Come

Avatar:

Livvie:
